code:
-spec good_subsetof_binary_matrix(Grid :: [[integer()]]) -> [integer()].
good_subsetof_binary_matrix(Grid) ->
    {Indices, _} = lists:foldl(fun (Row, {Acc, _} = AccFull) ->
                                   Indices = lists:seq(0, length(Row) - 1),
                                   Sums = lists:map(fun(I) -> lists:sum([lists:nth(I + 1, R) || R <- Grid]) end, Indices),
                                   K = length(Grid),
                                   GoodIndices = lists:foldl(fun (Idx, GoodAcc) ->
                                                                 ColSum = lists:nth(Idx + 1, Sums),
                                                                 if
                                                                     ColSum =< K div 2 -> [Idx | GoodAcc];
                                                                     true -> GoodAcc
                                                                 end
                                                             end, [], Indices),
                                   if
                                       length(GoodIndices) == length(Grid) -> {lists:seq(0, length(Grid) - 1), true};
                                       true -> AccFull
                                   end
                               end, {[], false}, Grid),
    if
        Indices =/= [] -> Indices;
        true -> []
    end.
